New-York Historical Society
Abeel & Dunscomb records
Abeel & Dunscomb (New York, N.Y.)
AHMC – Abeel & Dunscomb
59 items (in 2 folders)
1795-1827 A small collection of receipts and invoices, dated 1795-1827, mostly for goods purchased at auction or from other dealers, for resale by Abeel & Dunscomb, New York City iron merchants. To request this item for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
